about_the_game:
Imagine a place where the line between reality and nightmare fades away. Welcome to The Lethe.

Once a sanctuary for society's most fragile minds, The Lethe concealed a sinister truth beneath its facade of healing. What was meant to mend the broken was, in reality, a twisted experiment designed to shatter the soul.

In RealEscape, an immersive 3D single-player escape room game, you’ll confront the chilling remnants of this abandoned asylum. Every room tells a story, every shadow whispers a secret, and every step drags you deeper into its horrifying past. Can you unravel the truth and escape, or will you become another victim lost in its endless maze?

Key Features:

  • Interactive Exploration: Search, interact, and piece together the environment to uncover its dark secrets.

  • An Intriguing Narrative: Begin your journey as part of a team, but soon discover the true horror of being utterly alone.

  • Diverse Challenges: Explore three distinct rooms, each offering a unique aesthetic, story, and gameplay style:

    • The Hospital: A twisted labyrinth of psychological puzzles that will test your wits.

    • The Lost Mines: An adventurous trek into forgotten depths filled with hidden dangers.

    • The Nightmare Escape: A frantic race for survival as a terrifying creature hunts you in the dark.

  • Think Outside the Box: Solve intricate puzzles, utilize objects in unexpected ways, and observe every detail to find your way out.

The Lethe is more than a game; it’s an invitation. Do you dare to answer the call?

name: RealEscape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13620H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Rtx 2060
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Enter The Lethe, where reality and nightmare collide. Once a haven for healing, this asylum hides dark secrets. In RealEscape, a 3D single-player escape room game, explore 3 unique rooms, solve intricate puzzles, and survive threats. The Lethe is calling—will you escape or become its next victim?
